//From other Provides unlimited access to designated bus routes for 30 days. Valid from date of purchase until end of 30-day period. • Convenient and suited for regular commuters, students, and professionals!

• Unlimited access for unlimited routes!

Bus Pass E-Wallet Map Ticket Booking
Enjoy hassle-free boarding with our bus pass feature. Choose from a range of options based on duration and price tier, and travel unlimited distances without having to buy a ticket every time. Say goodbye to cash and cards with our secure e-wallet feature. Add funds to your account and pay for your bus rides directly from your phone with just a few taps. Navigate your route with ease using our interactive map feature. Search for nearby stations and centers, get real-time updates on bus routes, and plan your journey ahead of time. Book your tickets quickly and easily with our paperless, online ticket booking feature. Purchase a ticket and scan it at the bus station from your phone for a hassle-free experience.
